description: [Ninja](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1100) can obtain the computer name and information on the OS and physical drives from targeted hosts.(Citation: Kaspersky ToddyCat June 2022)(Citation: Kaspersky ToddyCat Check Logs October 2023)

external_references.description: Dedola, G. (2022, June 21). APT ToddyCat. Retrieved January 3, 2024.
Dedola, G. et al. (2023, October 12). ToddyCat: Keep calm and check logs. Retrieved January 3, 2024.
